amendment.description: An amendment to add a new title prohibiting issuance of transportation security cards to convicted felons. The amendment is considered pursuant to the instructions contained in the Cantor motion to recommit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new title prohibiting issuance of transportation security cards to convicted felons. The amendment is considered pursuant to the instructions contained in the Cantor motion to recommit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Transportation amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastruct.
